Module CamelotJava
Package com.playerInput

Class PlayerInteraction

java.lang.Object
com.playerInput.PlayerInteraction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayerChoice
public class PlayerInteraction extends Object implements IPlayerChoice
PlayerInteraction is the class you must use to create a player choice via interacting with other entities. For example a character sitting on a chair or taking an item from another character
Author:
Alireza Shirvani
See Also:
  • IPlayerChoice

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerInteraction(Characters player, String action, IInteract target)
    Use this constructor for the choices where the player enters the vicinity of an entity.
    PlayerInteraction(String action, IInteract target, PlayerInteraction.Icons icon, String description)
    Use this constructor for the choices where the player must right click on an interactable to make a choice.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerInteraction

      public PlayerInteraction(Characters player, String action, IInteract target)
      Use this constructor for the choices where the player enters the vicinity of an entity.
      Parameters:
      player - The character object that represents the player.
      action - Give a unique action name to this choice.
      target - The player makes this choice by entering the vicinity of this interactable..

    • PlayerInteraction

      public PlayerInteraction(String action, IInteract target, PlayerInteraction.Icons icon, String description)
      Use this constructor for the choices where the player must right click on an interactable to make a choice.
      Parameters:
      action - Give a unique action name to this choice.
      target - The entity that the player must right click on to make this choice.
      icon - Choose an icon that is shown to the player for this option.
      description - Give a description of the action that is shown to the player for this option.

  • Method Details

    • getInputMsg

      public String getInputMsg()
      Description copied from interface: IPlayerChoice
      This function summarizes this player choice to a string that is readable by Camelot
      Specified by:
      getInputMsg in interface IPlayerChoice
      Returns:
      The Camelot input message that corresponds to this player choice. This message is determined by the classes that implement this interface
